lead_paragraph: MY DEAR MR. GRINNELL: I write to you in much agitation and confusion of mind, which you will not wonder at, when you hear that Capt. Penny, with his two ships, has returned, and announces the approaching return of Capt. Austin's squadron, after being out for only half the period for which they were equipped.

headline.main: Letter from Lady Franklin to Mr. Grinnell.
